summary: This bill, the "Supporting the Mental Health of Educators and Staff Act of 2025," aims to address the mental health and well-being of education professionals and school staff. It mandates the dissemination of best practices for suicide prevention and mental health improvement. It establishes an education and awareness initiative to encourage seeking mental health support, and authorizes funding for programs to promote mental health within the education workforce, including grants for new and existing programs and training initiatives. The bill also requires reviews and reports on the effectiveness of these programs and a GAO report on related federal grant programs.
